title: 2026 : The Year of Mega - IPOs ?
description: It appears this year is shaping up to be the year that many of the largest private companies finally go public. It could start sooner than expected as SpaceX has hired bankers for a potential IPO this year.

# 2026: The Year of Mega-IPOs?

Motley Fool Staff, The Motley Fool

Fri, January 30, 2026 at 9:32 AM EST19 min read

In this podcast, Motley Fool contributors Tyler Crowe, Matt Frankel, and Jon Quast discuss:

- **Rocket Lab**'s test failure.

- SpaceX's IPO rumors and who could quickly follow.

- Investing advice when analyzing IPOs.

- Potential IPOs on their radar.
